mapper.sql: id, owner, money, name, expected_date, customer_id, stage, type, source, activity_id, contacts_id, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time
mapper.select: select count(*) as value,dv.value as name from tbl_tran t join tbl_dic_value dv on t.stage=dv.id group by t.stage

select t.id,u.name as owner, t.money, t.name, t.expected_date, d1.name as customer_id, d2.value as stage, d3.value as type, d4.value as source, t.activity_id, d5.fullname as contacts_id, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.edit_by, t.edit_time, t.description, t.contact_summary, t.next_contact_time from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner=u.id join tbl_customer d1 on t.customer_id=d1.id join tbl_dic_value d2 on t.stage=d2.id left join tbl_dic_value d3 on t.type=d3.id left join tbl_dic_value d4 on t.source=d4.id join tbl_contacts d5 on t.contacts_id=d5.id

select t.id,u.name as owner, t.money, t.name, t.expected_date, d1.name as customer_id, d2.value as stage,d2.order_no, d3.value as type, d4.value as source, ac.name as activity_id, d5.fullname as contacts_id, us1.name as create_by, t.create_time, us2.name as edit_by, t.edit_time, t.description, t.contact_summary, t.next_contact_time from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner=u.id join tbl_customer d1 on t.customer_id=d1.id join tbl_dic_value d2 on t.stage=d2.id left join tbl_dic_value d3 on t.type=d3.id left join tbl_dic_value d4 on t.source=d4.id join tbl_contacts d5 on t.contacts_id=d5.id left join tbl_activity ac on t.activity_id=ac.id join tbl_user us1 on t.create_by=us1.id left join tbl_user us2 on t.edit_by=us2.id where t.id=#{id}

select
distinct
from tbl_tran
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
VALUES IDENTITY_VAL_LOCAL()
insert into tbl_tran (owner, money, name, expected_date, customer_id, stage, type, source, activity_id, contacts_id, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time) values (#{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expected_date,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{customer_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{contacts_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{create_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{edit_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edit_time,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact_summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{next_contact_time,jdbcType=CHAR})

VALUES IDENTITY_VAL_LOCAL()

mapper.update:
update tbl_tran
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=CHAR},
owner = #{record.owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
money = #{record.money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expected_date = #{record.expected_date,jdbcType=CHAR},
customer_id = #{record.customer_id,jdbcType=CHAR},
stage = #{record.stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

contact_summary = #{record.contact_summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_contact_time = #{record.next_contact_time,jdbcType=CHAR},

update tbl_tran set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=CHAR}, owner = #{record.owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, money = #{record.money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expected_date = #{record.expected_date,jdbcType=CHAR}, customer_id = #{record.customer_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, stage = #{record.stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{record.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{record.activity_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, contacts_id = #{record.contacts_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{record.create_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.create_time,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{record.edit_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{record.edit_time,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_summary = #{record.contact_summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{record.next_contact_time,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_tran
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expected_date = #{expected_date,jdbcType=CHAR},
customer_id = #{customer_id,jdbcType=CHAR},
stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_id = #{activity_id,jdbcType=CHAR},

edit_time = #{edit_time,jdbcType=CHAR},

contact_summary = #{contact_summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_contact_time = #{next_contact_time,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_tran set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expected_date = #{expected_date,jdbcType=CHAR}, customer_id = #{customer_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{activity_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, contacts_id = #{contacts_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{create_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{edit_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{edit_time,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_summary = #{contact_summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{next_contact_time,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
